Our Products

PE, CPE, PPE Ziplock and Bone Paste Bags

We produce PE, CPE, and PPE ziplock bags as well as bone paste bags, with thicknesses ranging from 0.05 mm to 0.12 mm. These bags are suitable for a wide range of applications and provide strong sealing and durability. Custom sizes are available to suit your packaging requirements.

Standard Plastic Bags, Self-Adhesive Bags, and Flat Bags

We also provide a variety of plastic bags, including standard plastic bags, self-adhesive bags, and flat bags, with thicknesses ranging from 0.03 mm to 0.2 mm. These products are customizable to meet different industrial needs, providing reliable and versatile packaging solutions.

Other PE Products

In addition to our ziplock and self-adhesive bags, we offer a variety of other PE products that are designed to meet diverse packaging requirements. These include flat bags and other custom PE packaging solutions, available in various sizes and thicknesses.

Product Specifications

Product Type Material Thickness Range (mm) Features
Ziplock Bags PE, CPE, PPE 0.05 - 0.12 Strong sealing, reusable, custom sizes available
Bone Paste Bags PE, CPE, PPE 0.05 - 0.12 Durable sealing, available in multiple sizes
Standard Plastic Bags PE 0.03 - 0.2 Available in various sizes, suitable for general use
Self-Adhesive Bags PE 0.03 - 0.2 Easy sealing, commonly used for packaging small items
Flat Bags PE 0.03 - 0.2 Customizable sizes, ideal for simple packaging needs
